captions.text:
When you see us approaching, don't run away.
Come close but slow down, you might trip and fall.

Today Ugandans and Germans made a 
powerful appearance together.

Breakdance Project Uganda, Viva con Agua,
Green Berlin we're untouchable.

Because of my presence haters have dispersed
Here I am, the descendant

On the journey for the official musical duty
I never let down to be on this song
With Maeckes and Marteria it was with pleasure.

I feel so good when you are around
It makes sense when I am part of this

One by one makes bundle Germany to Uganda
Together we can make the wonders

Achieve so much together as a team
With no division let's build together

Yes,... achieve as a team
With no division let's build together

title: BLUE UGANDA - Marteria, Maeckes, Abramz, Sylvester, Lady Slyke, Bris Jean
